12:14 <marvio> has joined #xwiki  
12:26 <marvio> Guys,  im confused. We are using xwiki for a while with active dir int. For an odd reason a user reports not being able to login.  
12:27 <marvio> Active directory integration doesnt feel solid.

14:02 <Enygma`> has joined #xwiki  
14:45 <ClemensR> has joined #xwiki  
14:47 <cjd> has joined #xwiki  
14:47 <ClemensR> I guess we have spammer in the issue tracker:   http://jira.xwiki.org/secure/ViewProfile.jspa?name=Patrickmorton  ... I am going to delete that account unless someone has a better idea  
14:47 <vmassol> wait  
14:47 <vmassol> ClemensR:  I have changed the password  
14:47 <lucaa> has joined #xwiki  
14:47 <ClemensR> ah ok  
14:47 <vmassol> and contacted patrick  
14:48 <vmassol> oh actually I contacted the wrong guy  
14:48 <vmassol> :)  
14:48 <vmassol> I contacted Patrick Masson  
14:48 <vmassol> and I see it's patrick morton  
14:48 <vmassol> fixing this  
14:48 <ClemensR> yes, I guess that this is just a dedicated spam account, by its email  
14:49 <vmassol> did you check his AS  
14:49 <vmassol> ?  
14:49 <ClemensR> interestingly has lots of spam from jira.apache,.org in its activity stream, interesting that the activity steam lists comments from there  
14:50 <vmassol> he only did spam from the beginning?  
14:50 <vmassol> indeed the email looks fake  
14:50 <ClemensR> I cannot get to the bottom :(  
14:50 <vmassol> so indeed you're right  
14:50 <ClemensR> all I see is spam, however, but it is from "less than one hour ago"  
14:50 <vmassol> we need to delete that account  
14:50 <vmassol> you want to do it?  
14:51 <ClemensR> becaue ther is lots of spam from other issue trackers, magically associated with that account  
14:51 <vmassol> yeah  
14:51 <ClemensR> I see 16 comments on jira.xwiki.org must be deleted first, doing so now  
14:52 <vmassol> I got to the bottom  
14:52 <vmassol> only spam  
14:52 <vmassol> ClemensR: let me know if I should delete the account or if you're doing it  
14:53 <ClemensR>  vmassol: I am doing it, but  the issue tracker told me I have to scrap the comments first  
14:54 <vmassol> indeed let's do that first  
14:54 <vmassol> I started  
14:54 <lucaa> has quit  
14:54 <ClemensR> so this needs a momen, 11 comments still to go  
14:54 <ClemensR> ah, good, I am woring my way up, so is you start from te tpo ..  
14:55 <ClemensR> s/te tpo/the top/ ... never mind  
14:55 <vmassol> ok  
14:57 <vmassol> ok now?  
14:57 <vmassol> yup seems good  
14:57 <ClemensR> I guess so ... trying to delete  
14:58 <ClemensR> " This action cannot be undone. "  ... who wants that :)  .. gone  
14:58 <vmassol> :)  
14:58 <vmassol> thanks  
14:58 <vmassol> ClemensR: btw we miss you at the XWiki SAS seminar! :)  
14:58 <vmassol> (still there)  
14:59 <ClemensR> vmassol: yes, sorry for missing it, I hope you have fun there  
14:59 <vmassol> thanks, np  
14:59 <ClemensR> just feels sorry for myself, not you ;)  
14:59 <vmassol> hehe
